alert.note: Alert for George (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 2:53AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Mobile and southeastern George Counties through 345 AM CDT... At 252 AM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Wade to 3 miles northwest of Escatawpa to 8 miles southeast of Gulf Park Estates to 21 miles southwest of Petit Bois Island. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Downtown Mobile, Prichard, Tillmans Corner, Saraland, Theodore, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Grand Bay, Bayou La Batre, Creola, Dauphin Island, Chunchula, Axis, Semmes, Tanner Williams, I65 And I165, Coden, Mobile Regional Airport and Wilmer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
